content:
Lecture Summary

Lecture Summary

  • The “software crisis” or the “software challenge”
    • Studies show that software is expensive, faulty, unused, unusable, dominated by maintenance
    • Software requirements are rapidly outpacing software technology
  • Software engineering is
    • the ability to consistently fashion software to solve appropriate problems in an orderly, predictable manner
    • An approach to the overall problem
    • Techniques to apply in each area of the approach
